name: GemDash
description:
Note: ClamBucket Games is a made-up game studio for the Advanced Game Design and Development (T-634-AGDD) course at Reykjavik University, Spring 2021.

Description

GemDash is a single-player game made by Clambucket Games for a level design project in order for us to get a better feel for level mechanics and how to design levels well.

Context 

You are an explorer, an adventurer! After hearing about a very treacherous cave that many people have perished trying to get to the bottom of, you knew it was your destiny to journey to the bottom! Beware though, the cave is very dangerous.

Gameplay 

Journey to the bottom of the dangerous cave and traverse the horrible dangers within. Use the torches to your advantage and watch out for the toxic fumes that reside within the cave. Good luck!

Controls 

The game is designed to be played using only your keyboard. 

Move Left[ A ]Move Right[ D ]Jump[ SPACE ]Dash[ SHIFT  + W / A / S / D ]

The arrow keys can also be used instead of the WASD keys to move around.

Attributions 

Sprites:

Sprites for coins and gems are by La Red Games ( https://laredgames.itch.io/gems-coins-free )

Sound:

This game uses these sounds from https://freesound.org/ and http://freesoundeffect.net/:

  • Air Pick Up Sound by Joao_Janz ( https://freesound.org/people/Joao_Janz/sounds/478336/ )
  • Coin Pick Up Sound
    by ProjectsU012 ( https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695/ )
  • Slime Sound 
    from (http://freesoundeffect.net/sound/app-game-sticky-splat-4-sound-effect )
  • Fire Sound
    from ( https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/whoosh-and-s... )

Music:

  •  Dead Voxel by C418 ( Daniel Rosenfeld @C418 ) from the album https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/minecraft-volume-beta
